markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Depth Charge](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2048)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 81 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** any

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Carved with stylized images of water or aquatic life, _depth charges_ that are fired underwater or at a submerged target function with their normal range increments and can hit no matter their normal damage type. This ammunition explodes if it hits a target underwater, dealing bludgeoning damage in a 20-foot burst ([basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save) according to its type. This burst doesn't extend out of the water.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Depth Charge (I)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 81 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

This ammunition deals 3d6 bludgeoning damage with a DC of 20.
